description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.rSCtPhGa3oOZF1fR]{Dimension Door}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.TY3H60M9iSPDKNFs]{Dispel Magic}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.3IgBV1u2jC8ZD6kq]{Invisibility}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.c7qbXQUyugRjCVBw]{Wizard's Escape}
